title: Big K.R.I.T. - Live from the Underground (2012) - (iTunes Rip)
description:
Live from the Underground is the debut studio album of American hip hop recording artist, songwriter, and producer Big K.R.I.T. It was released on June 5, 2012.[1] K.R.I.T. produced the album in its entirety.
